name: Glitch (itch) (stefanvermunt)
description:
Hi!

This my first game on Itch.io.
I joined the Jamingtons 9.0 GameJam
And this game is the result of that.

Game:
In Glitch you control a spaceship.
Navigate trough space avoiding obstacles.
But watch out.. sometimes a obstacle glitches and you have to remember it for later.

Controls:
- Up arrow to fly up
- Down arrow to fly down

Have fun!
